benchmark_details.name: DEBATE QA
benchmark_details.overview: DEBATE QA is a dataset of 2,941 debatable questions, each accompanied by multiple human-annotated partial answers that capture a variety of perspectives.

purpose_and_intended_users.goal: To assess language models' ability to answer debatable questions.

data.source: The dataset is sourced from a combination of existing controversial question datasets and manual sourcing from various online platforms.
data.annotation: Human-annotated by multiple annotators to ensure a variety of perspectives.

methods: Automated metrics based on generated responses
methodology.calculation: Metrics are calculated based on the alignment of model answers with diverse partial answers.
methodology.interpretation: A higher score indicates better performance in delivering comprehensive, multi-perspective answers to debatable questions.
methodology.validation: The dataset has been validated using human annotators to ensure quality and relevance of the answers.
